Employer Identification No.) 1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, California 95014 (Address of principal executive offices) (Zip Code) (408) 996-1010 (Registrant&#146;s telephone number, including area code) Not applicable (Former name or former address, if changed since last report.) Check the appropriate box below if the Form 8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the Registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#168; Written communications pursuant to Rule 425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#168; Soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#168; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#168; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;8.01 Other Events. On June&nbsp;3, 2015, Apple Inc. (&#147;Apple&#148;) entered into an underwriting agreement (the &#147;Underwriting Agreement&#148;) with Goldman Sachs&nbsp;International and Mitsubishi UFJ Securities International plc for the issuance and sale by Apple of &yen;250,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of Apple&#146;s 0.350% Notes due 2020 (the &#147;Notes&#148;). The Notes will be issued pursuant to an indenture, dated as of April&nbsp;29, 2013 (the &#147;Indenture&#148;), between Apple and The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., as trustee, together with the officer&#146;s certificate dated as of June&nbsp;10, 2015 issued pursuant thereto establishing the terms of the Notes (the &#147;Officer&#146;s Certificate&#148;). The Notes are being issued pursuant to Apple&#146;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on April&nbsp;29, 2013 (Reg. No.&nbsp;333-188191) (the &#147;Registration Statement&#148;). Interest on the Notes will be payable semi-annually on June&nbsp;10 and December&nbsp;10 of each year, beginning on December&nbsp;10, 2015, and on the maturity date of the Notes. The Notes will mature on June&nbsp;10, 2020. The Notes will be Apple&#146;s senior unsecured obligations and will rank equally with Apple&#146;s other unsecured and unsubordinated debt from time to time outstanding. The foregoing description of the Notes and related agreements is qualified in its entirety by the terms of the Underwriting Agreement, the Indenture and the Officer&#146;s Certificate (including the form of the Notes). The Underwriting Agreement and the Officer&#146;s Certificate (including the form of the Notes) are attached hereto as Exhibits 1.1 and 4.1 through 4.2, respectively, and incorporated herein by reference. The Indenture is filed as Exhibit 4.1 to the Registration Statement. Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &nbsp; (d) Exhibits &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 1.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Underwriting Agreement, dated as of June 3, 2015, among Apple Inc., Goldman Sachs International and Mitsubishi UFJ Securities International plc 4.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Officer&#146;s Certificate of Apple Inc., dated as of June 10, 2015 4.2 &nbsp;&nbsp; Form of Global Note representing the Notes (included in Exhibit 4.1) 5.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Opinion of Shearman &amp; Sterling LLP 23.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Consent of Shearman &amp; Sterling LLP (included in the opinion filed as Exhibit 5.1) SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; Date: June&nbsp;10, 2015 Apple Inc. By: /s/&nbsp;Luca Maestri Luca Maestri Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer EXHIBIT INDEX &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 1.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Underwriting Agreement, dated as of June 3, 2015, among Apple Inc., Goldman Sachs International and Mitsubishi UFJ Securities International plc 4.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Officer&#146;s Certificate of Apple Inc., dated as of June 10, 2015 4.2 &nbsp;&nbsp; Form of Global Note representing the Notes (included in Exhibit 4.1) 5.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Opinion of Shearman &amp; Sterling LLP 23.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Consent of Shearman &amp; Sterling LLP (included in the opinion filed as Exhibit 5.1)
